title: Calories in a Sausage McGriddle
meta_description: Learn calories in sausage mcgriddle from McDonald's, including full nutrition facts like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick variations for your breakfast.
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McGriddle: sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese on maple-flavored griddle cakes; standard serving size ~195 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data. Check app or labels for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage McGriddle has about 550 kcal, with 18 g protein and 48 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's sausage mcgriddle?
faqs.a: Approximately 550 kcal for one standard Sausage McGriddle.

faqs.q: What's the protein in sausage mcgriddle?
faqs.a: About 18 g protein per Sausage McGriddle.

faqs.q: Are sausage mcgriddles high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1120 mg sodium due to sausage, cheese, and pancakes.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a sausage mcgriddle?
faqs.a: Roughly 48 g carbs, including 15 g sugars from maple-flavored cakes.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie sausage mcgriddle?
faqs.a: Yes, skip cheese or use egg whites to reduce by 50+ kcal.
